# My Next.js Application
This is a Next.js application created with qBoot.
## Getting Started
First, install dependencies: ```bash npm install ```
Then run the development server: ```bash npm run dev ```
Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) in your browser.
## Features
- Next.js 14+ with App Router - TypeScript configuration - Tailwind CSS for styling - ESLint for code quality - Auto-configured with best practices
## Learn More
- [Next.js Documentation](https://nextjs.org/docs) - [TypeScript Documentation](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) - [Tailwind CSS Documentation](https://tailwindcss.com/docs)
# Environment variables for local development NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_NAME=My Next.js App
